name: Men's Tree Runners
highlights: lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fiber provides next-level comfort
cushioned midsole gives wear-all-day support
machine-washable materials keep shoes looking like new

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Our breathable, silky-smooth sneaker made with responsibly sourced eucalyptus tree fiber treads lightly in everything you do.

**Best For:** Walking, warmer weather, everyday wear

**Thermoregulating Material:** Lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fiber provides next-level comfort

**Versatile Design:** Wear-with-everything classic style, great for travel

**Where It’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate)

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Tree Runner has a carbon footprint of 4.99 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact. 

As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) upper
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* Bio-based TPU eyelets
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining
* Some models may include a wool-lined insole instead of the TENCEL™-lined insole featured in the image

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
1. Remove the laces and insoles.

2. Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).

3. Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.

4. Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.

5. Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears. 

  
Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new laces and insoles.

dropdown.title: Shipping & Returns
dropdown.content:
Free shipping on orders over $75, and our 30 days, no questions asked return policy. Lightly worn shoes get donated to Soles4Souls. Visit our [Returns Portal](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/returns-exchanges).

Final Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged. Final Sale items include: gift cards, insoles, sock bundles, TrinoXO Face Masks, and items tagged final sale on our website and in Allbirds retail stores.

Need it sooner? See if the style you want is available at a [store near you](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/stores).

text.p: our proprietary knit feels silky smooth, breathable, and pleasantly cool thanks to eucalyptus tree fiber responsibly sourced from fsc® certified forests.
contoured and delightfully bouncy, our brazilian sugarcane midsole is called sweetfoam®, which is made with the world’s first carbon negative green eva.
our laces are made from 100% post-consumer recycled polyester. one old plastic bottle becomes one pair of shoelaces.

name: Men's Trail Runner SWT Mizzles
highlights: bio-based water-repellent shield keeps shoes and feet dry
rugged outsole grips hiking trails
tear-resistant ripstop mudguard protects feet from tough terrain

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Go off road in all the elements with this grippy, wet-weather shoe made to handle everything the trail throws at you. 

**Best For:** Wet-weather trail running, hiking, walking

**Natural Innovation:** Durable, water-repellent finish helps keep shoes from getting soggy

**All-Condition Traction:** Multi-directional 4mm lugs for maximum stability on tough trails

**Where It’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate).

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Trail Runner SWT Mizzle is carbon neutral thanks to sustainable practices, like using more natural materials and funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects). But before we balance the emissions, its footprint starts at 9.5 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) and ZQ Merino Wool blend upper
* Fluorine-free bio-based water-repellent shield
* ZQ Merino wool and recycled polyester ripstop
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Bio-based TPU seam tape and heel counter
* Bio-based nylon eyelets
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ Merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

dropdown.title: Shipping & Returns
dropdown.content:
Free shipping on orders over $75, and our 30 days, no questions asked return policy. Lightly worn shoes get donated to Soles4Souls. Visit our [Returns Portal](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/returns-exchanges).

Final Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged. Final Sale items include: gift cards, insoles, sock bundles, TrinoXO Face Masks, and items tagged final sale on our website and in Allbirds retail stores.

Need it sooner? See if the style you want is available at a [store near you](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/stores).

text.p: keep your feet dry with our breathable, bio-based shield and wool upper treated with an eco passport certified (by oeko-tex®) fluorine-free water repellent coating.
our first-ever running shoe designed for the trails is sustainably-engineered and intentionally designed for durability, comfort, and performance.

we rigorously tested the original trail runner over 2,000 miles with 100 runners of all ages, abilities, and body types. the real-world feedback, revisions (and revisions..) and miles logged on every type of wet, dry, and rocky trail are what helped us get the comfort, fit and performance just right.

text.p: soft and itch-free on the inside, the zq merino wool upper helps keep your feet dry thanks to our breathable, bio-based shield treated with fluorine-free water repellent coating.
optimized for cushion, stability, and energy return, our dual-density sweetfoam® midsole is made with the world’s first carbon negative green eva.
the hardworking sweetfoam® sole features fsc® certified natural rubber treads for extra traction in wet conditions. and the flared, geometric design adds even more stability.
it’s important to stand out when you’re running in dark and stormy conditions. reflective highlights around the shoe help pick up headlights so you can be seen on the streets.
our removable castor bean sockliner emits less carbon than petroleum-based foam and is contoured to provide flexible, anatomical support.

reviews.title: Plenty of room, comfortable fit,
reviews.content: Plenty of room, comfortable fit, very light weight, great design with the tongueless front, and the wool , so soft and comfortable! I will definitely be purchasing more shoes soon… keep up the great work!

reviews.title: Supper beautiful, but even more comfortable!
reviews.content:
I bought these shoes online because I loved the way they looked, and I wasn't disappointed. Every previous pair of Allbirds I've had were super-comfy, so that wasn't a concern.

I remember thinking as I was walking home from work last week and thinking these maybe the most comfortable shoe I have ever had!

As a bonus they are so easy to slip on...

highlights: new bio-based swiftfoam™ midsole is light, bouncy, and ready for distance running
fluorine-free outer coating repels water and keeps feet dry

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Chilly runs are the best runs in our springy, water-resistant, Wool Flyer Mizzles. Nature-made water repellent technology keeps the elements out so you can get more miles in.

**Best For:** Wet-weather long distance runs, jogs, workouts, ambitious walks

**SwiftFoam Saves The Day.** New high-performance midsole is big on cushion and energy return, making long runs easier on your body.

**A Cushier Crash Pad:** Sportier, angular heel shape softens impact

**Natural Innovation:** A bio-based liner keeps feet dry during rainy winter runs

**Where it’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate)

dropdown.title: Testing And Specs
dropdown.content:
Built using the original Flyer, which went through an extensive testing and development process with over 100 runners logging thousands of miles across an array of conditions and climates.

Heel Drop: Forefoot 22mm, Heel 30.5mm

Weight: 9.93oz (281.5g)

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Wool Flyer Mizzle is carbon neutral thanks to sustainable practices, like using more natural materials and funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects). But before we balance the emissions, its footprint starts at 7.6 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* Fluorine-free bio-based water-repellent shield
* SwiftFoam™ midsole made with bio-based Pebax®
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* SweetFoam® insole foam
* ZQ Merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

reviews.title: Love the look and initial feel -- unable to keep clean!

The back part of the shoe is the hardest to keep clean/avoid going brown. My wish for Allbirds team is to make these incredible, sustainable shoes with colored soles so they do not look old/dirty so quick! Thank you!

reviews.title: “It’s complicated”
reviews.content:
Aesthetically these shoes are spot on: color (#obsessed), good profile, nice height, etc. Extremely comfortable upper - love this part of the design and make. Excellent quality and work. Five stars.

The sole is another story. While the arch support is great, it feels like there is too much support on the outside edge. The first several times I wore them for my usual 4-6mi walks, the outside edge of my feet felt unusually sore. Being someone who pays attention to my stance (pronation vs supination vs neutral), I felt this shoe encouraged me to pronate, at first (so maybe this would be good for people who supinate? Talk to your chiro/podiatrist). Three stars.

I bought mine specifically for running—I run on the balls of my feet—and they do provide a good cushion to that aim. Took mine around 4-7 wears (of around 1.5 hrs each) for them to feel like my feet are at home.

 The only downside is that the elastic instep band tugs a bit on socks as you put on the shoes. Resolved by stretching the sock toe out beforehand to allow for this.

reviews.title: Really comfy as long as you're not walking a lot in them
reviews.content:
I got these Allbirds for a trip to London after seeing lots of reviews saying they were very comfortable for walking long distances, and that there was plenty of padding. Unfortunately that didn't match my experience, and a week into my trip I went and got a pair of Nikes. I'm keeping the Allbirds for bumming around in when I don't have a lot to do, but I can't recommend them for travel or lots of walking.

They were very cute and were comfortable out of the box -- no rubbing or chafing -- but were not very supportive or cushioned in the bottom. The cushion in the sole is about a quarter or half an inch thick. This was great for car and plane rides, but I spent a day walking around in a museum in these and by the end my feet were killing me. 

Also, the white wool attracts dirt and dust and it STICKS. They looked very dirty by day three. I'm glad they're washable because they would be completely ruined otherwise. 

I wanted to love them, as I really support the move toward more sustainable footwear and I like that they are washable, but was disappointed in their performance.

I will say is that I wish the laces were longer. I use custom orthotic insert that pushes my foot just a little bit higher in the shoe. The shoe is still comfortable and fits right, but the laces fall a bit short in accomodating for that height.

Rain or shine, the Mizzles deliver!

reviews.title: super stylish but not as comfy as the sneakers
reviews.content: i'm super happy with this purchase, mostly because of how stylish they are, since they are leather they can get a bit sweaty after a long day of walking, and unfortunately (as expected) they aren't as comfortable as the regular wool runners (i'm sure the tree ones are similar). however they are much more comfortable than the converse i replaced and they seem to be really durable. if your feet are a little wider than average, like myself, you might need extra breaking in time

reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.content: I have wider feet and they’re a little narrower at the top than I want and not aa comfortable than their running shoes but they’re cute and due to what they’re made of, they don’t stain as easily!

reviews.title: Has to be fit loosely
reviews.content: These shoes will rub the skin off the back of your heels if they are tied snugly. This was a huge surprise to me as they were perfectly comfortable worn around the store for a few minutes. I have to assume the store pair had been broken in by other feet!

reviews.title: These are Cool
reviews.content: Great looking shoes and oh so comfortable!

reviews.title: The “plant leather” material in
reviews.content:
The “plant leather” material in these shoes doesn’t breathe as well as the wool-based Allbyrds I’m used to.

Also they don’t fit as well - the material is stiffer, which results in slippage in the heels and rubbing on my arches. Fortunately I can loosen the laces in the middle of the shoes to create room for my arches, but then I have to carefully tie them tightly at the top so they don’t slide.

On plus side they look sharp and they’re getting more comfortable as I wear them regularly.

dropdown.title: Description
dropdown.content:
Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.

* Heel Drop: 7mm (Forefoot: 15.5mm, Heel: 22.5mm)

As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
* Remove the insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. They’ll go back to their original shape in no time. You can hand wash your insoles on their own.

Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new insoles. Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

text.p: using leftover stock yarns from our sampling process, we knit a special one-piece upper made from fsc certified eucalyptus trees. the end result? a look that’s one-of-a-kind and unique to each shoe and perfect fit that’s flexible, breathable, and better for the planet.
optimized for cushion, stability and energy return, our dual-density sweetfoam® midsole is made with the world’s first carbon negative green eva.
slide into your best run, jog, walk… ever thanks to a handy pull tab and our natural, knit material that’s flexible and breathable but sturdy enough to offer support.
we added our signature zq merino wool along the heel counter to center, support, and lock your foot in place.
designed with a new outsole geometry, our sole brings together sweetfoam™and natural rubber traction pads for increased pronation control and stability.
our removable castor bean sockliner emits less carbon than petroleum-based foam and is contoured to provide flexible, anatomical support.

dropdown.title: Care Guide

name: Women's Wool Runners
highlights: warm and cozy zq merino wool provides next-level comfort
cushioned midsole gives wear-all-day support
machine-washable materials keep shoes looking like new

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Shop the one that started it all: Our Merino Wool Runners. Our superfine ZQ Merino wool material is incredibly soft and cozy, naturally thermoregulating, and ready for anything. 

**ZQRx Regenerative Wool Material:** The wool used for our Regen Capsule is grown using regenerative farming practices that aim to help reverse climate change through practices that restore and preserve nature. [Learn more about our commitment to regenerative agriculture.](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/regenerative-agriculture)

**Best For:** Walking, cooler weather, everyday wear

**Super Soft Material:** Warm and cozy premium ZQ Merino wool provides next-level comfort

**Versatile Design:** Wear-with-everything classic style, great for travel

**Where It’s Made:** South Korea. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate).

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Wool Runner has a carbon footprint of 8.03kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact. As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Sustainable Materials:**

* ZQ certified Merino wool upper that meets the highest standards of animal welfare, environmental care, and social sustainability
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
1. Remove the laces and insoles.

2. Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).

3. Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.

4. Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.

5. Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears. 

  
Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new laces and insoles.

dropdown.title: Shipping & Returns
dropdown.content:
Free shipping on orders over $75, and our 30 days, no questions asked return policy. Lightly worn shoes get donated to Soles4Souls. Visit our [Returns Portal](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/returns-exchanges).

Final Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged. Final Sale items include: gift cards, insoles, sock bundles, TrinoXO Face Masks, and items tagged final sale on our website and in Allbirds retail stores.

Need it sooner? See if the style you want is available at [a store near you.](https://stores.allbirds.com/)

text.p: it’s soft and itch-free on the inside, durable on the outside, and ethically sourced to zq merino’s high standards for a cozy fit that treads light on the planet.
contoured and delightfully bouncy, our brazilian sugarcane midsole is called sweetfoam®, which is made with the world’s first carbon negative green eva.
we layered castor bean oil, which emits less carbon than petroleum-based foam, and zq merino wool for a cushiony, moisture wicking, and odor reducing insole.
our laces are made from 100% post-consumer recycled polyester. one old plastic bottle becomes one pair of shoelaces.

reviews.title: Walking on Clouds
reviews.content:
These are, by far, the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. I have a pair of Vessi Weekend shoes, which I thought were the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Although the Vessi's breathe better in hotter weather, my pair of Allbirds Hazy Cargo Wool Runners...speechless...much more comfortable than the Vessi Weekend shoes. They are light and soft. Every step feels like you're walking on clouds. It's heavenly.

The fit of shoe is snug and perfect, with a good stretch and give. I am 5'5" at 170lbs, mid-wide, no swollenness of any kind.

I could walk forever in these shoes. However, in weather hotter than 80-85 degrees Fahrenheit, the shoes do get a bit warm, and I find myself wanting to take them off after a few miles of walking.

name: Women's Trail Runners SWT
highlights: rugged outsole grips hiking trails
tear-resistant ripstop mudguard protects feet from tough terrain
snug, sock-like collar blocks debris

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Tackle off-road terrain with our first-ever hiking & trail running shoe. Top-tested for durability, stability, and traction, it’s the sneaker, comfort, and sustainability you love with new ripstop fabric, grippy treads, and stabilizing support to take on any adventure.

**Best For:** Trail running, hiking, walking

**Natural Innovation:** Durable, water-resistant finish helps keep shoes from getting soggy

**All-Condition Traction:** Multi-directional 4mm lugs perform on any terrain

**Where It’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate).

dropdown.title: Testing & Specs
dropdown.content:
We rigorously road tested The Trail Runner SWT over 2,000 miles with 100 runners of all ages, abilities, and body types.

**Specs:**

Heel Drop7mm (Forefoot: 18.0 mm, Heel: 25.0 mm)Weight9.99ozOutsoleMultidirectional 4mm outsole lugs

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Trail Runner SWTs has a carbon footprint of 9.37 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.  
  
As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) and ZQ Merino Wool blend upper
* ZQ Merino wool and recycled polyester ripstop
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Bio-based TPU seam tape and heel counter
* Bio-based nylon eyelets
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. They’ll go back to their original shape in no time. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.content: My husband and I love to visit national parks. We camp and hike a lot while there. Versatile, comfortable, ecofriendly. What’s not to love!

reviews.title: Fantastic for their Purpose!
reviews.content:
I chose black so I could wear them with any outfit. I wish I had the money to buy the other colors, too! They’re so comfortable and sturdy at the same time. I enjoy the sock-like feature around the ankle which has kept debris out of my shoes as I hike etc. 
They’re a bit wide style-wise (my mom asked if they were my dad’s!) but they’re not for fashion. They’ve served me so well so far and I LOVE bragging about how ethical they are! 
I’ve taken them through hikes, streets, and the dunes and they even kept sand out! 
I’ll definitely be purchasing again :D

dropdown.title: Details

Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new laces and insoles.

name: Men's Wool Flyer Mizzles
highlights: new bio-based swiftfoam™ midsole is light, bouncy, and ready for distance running
fluorine-free outer coating repels water and keeps feet dry
zq merino wool upper is lined with an extra bio-based layer for additional water protection

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Chilly runs are the best runs in our springy, water-resistant, Wool Flyer Mizzles. Nature-made water repellent technology keeps the elements out so you can get more miles in.

**Best For:** Wet-weather long distance runs, jogs, workouts, ambitious walks

**SwiftFoam Saves The Day.** New high-performance midsole is big on cushion and energy return, making long runs easier on your body.

**A Cushier Crash Pad:** Sportier, angular heel shape softens impact

**Natural Innovation:** A bio-based liner keeps feet dry during rainy winter runs

**Where it’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate)

dropdown.title: Testing And Specs
dropdown.content:
Built using the original Flyer, which went through an extensive testing and development process with over 100 runners logging thousands of miles across an array of conditions and climates.

Heel Drop: Forefoot 22mm, Heel 30.5mm

Weight: 9.93oz (281.5g)

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Wool Flyer Mizzle is carbon neutral thanks to sustainable practices, like using more natural materials and funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects). But before we balance the emissions, its footprint starts at 7.6 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* Fluorine-free bio-based water-repellent shield
* SwiftFoam™ midsole made with bio-based Pebax®
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* SweetFoam® insole foam
* ZQ Merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

dropdown.title: Shipping & Returns
dropdown.content:
Free shipping on orders over $75, and our 30 days, no questions asked return policy. Lightly worn shoes get donated to Soles4Souls. Visit our [Returns Portal](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/returns-exchanges).

Final Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged. Final Sale items include: gift cards, insoles, sock bundles, TrinoXO Face Masks, and items tagged final sale on our website and in Allbirds retail stores.

Need it sooner? See if the style you want is available at a [store near you](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/stores).

text.p: keep your feet dry with our breathable, bio-based shield and wool upper treated with an eco passport certified (by oeko-tex®) fluorine-free water repellent coating.
reinforced wool upper seamlessly hugs your foot and provides engineered support for both speed and comfort. your feet stay warm, dry, and itch-free so you can get more miles in.

lightweight and super springy, our new swiftfoam™ midsole makes your extra efforts feel effortless. it provides serious cushion and comfort, so even the toughest runs are easier on your body. and the flared, geometric design helps add stability to each and every stride.

we worked all the angles with our new swiftfoam™ midsole, literally cutting corners to help give you maximum cushioning with minimal weight. but we also went wide where needed. the flared heel design adds stability and helps keep your stride smooth and steady.

reviews.title: Mostly really great
reviews.content:
I really, REALLY like these shoes. I got them because I have really flat feet and need support, but also wanted a pair of shoes that looked a level above "going for a work out". And these shoes hit the mark. 

They are really comfortable. I especially like the wide toe-box. And the rain repellent works well for the early morning dog-walks through dewey grass. 

That said, I did miss the "walking on clouds" feeling you tend to get with high quality running shoes. These feel a little stiff at the beginning, something i hope works itself out as they break in.

reviews.title: Perfect Fit
reviews.content: I love these shoes. I wore them in NYC for my last trip and it was comfortable and cute. I haven’t tried the washing feature but so far they are the perfect fit.

name: Men's Wool Runner-up Mizzle Plus
highlights: soft and itch-free zq merino wool reinforced upper
fluorine-free water-repellent shield
25mm mud guard overlay for extra water protection

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Next-level water protection inside and out keeps feet warm, dry, and stable so you can weather any weather. 

**Best For:** Wet-weather walks, strolls, everyday wear

**Tread Steady:** SweetFoam™ and FSC Certified natural rubber track pads provide support on slippery surfaces.

**Made In:** South Korea. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate).

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Wool Runner-up Mizzle Plus has a carbon footprint of 12.55 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact. As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Sustainable Materials:**

* ZQ certified Merino Wool
* FSC certified Natural Rubber
* ECO Passport Certified (by OEKO-TEX®) fluorine-free water repellent

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new laces and insoles.

text.p: with airy mesh and springy, first-of-its kind foam, the superlight trainers add a whole new level of energy to any workout.

text.h2: light on your feet. heavy on natural innovation.
text.p: how do you make superlight shoes? it starts at the midsole. to create our new superlight foam, we took sweetfoam’s sugarcane base and infused it with nitrogen (versus chemical foaming additives). the result? our lightest and lowest carbon midsole ever.  it’s featherlight, high-performing, and even better for the planet thanks to approximately 70% bio-based content.

text.h2: a step closer to the cushion
text.p: we reimagined the traditional insert with a fully integrated insole (read: it’s built directly into the finished upper) for a supportive yet sleek underfoot feel that helps reduce material use.

made with a new breezy mesh (fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber combined with recycled monofilament), the multi-panel upper hugs your foot for ultimate stability and keeps the air flowing for all-day comfort.

The fit is strange, the toe box and front of the shoe is huge relative to other Allbird shoes (I own 3 other pairs/2 other models - see pic). I have wide feet, and when you tie them tighter the material has awkward bunching in this area.

reviews.title: Super comfortable, bouncy & soft, BUT, could be an ‘acquired’ fit
reviews.content:
Let me just start off by saying that I love these. They’re kind of like the perfect blend between slip Ons and sneakers and overall they’re just a unique shoe. I’m not a long-term AllBirds customer, I’ve only ever bought the the wool Pipers, which have been my most favorite shoe to-date (especially sock-less, lol!). I just absolutely love how they look and how they feel.

Now, when it comes to this shoe, there are a couple of things I wanna say; the fit is really nice, comfortable. And the shoes are bouncy and pretty soft from the inside (since there is wool over on the heel side). They have minor arch support, nothing crazy (if that’s what you’re looking for though you can just replace the insoles with the arch support ones), and overall are comfortable to walk in. They were a little tight for me in the beginning, but I just had to break them in a bit. The only problem I have with the fit is that every now-and-then it feels like my laces are untied, even though they’re not, might be due to the design.

When it comes to the style, as mentioned, they are like a mix between a slip-on and sneaker. The little flap part where the laces are is a bit forward than normal as you might be able to tell by the pictures. If you accidentally get a size up (like I did), they look a bit like clown shoes (LOL) so you’d have to make you get the right size. Other than that, it’s a matter of personal taste.

When it comes to durability, I’d have to post an update as I just bought them, but I bought my wool pipers more than a year ago and they’ve still lasted me pretty well (and I use them HEAVILY, even for stuff not really appropriate for them 😅). Basing myself off of those ones, the top part of the shoe holds up well, it’s just the sole that wears out more. If you clean them regularly, and appropriately, they’ll last you well.

That’s pretty much it, happy purchasing!

reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
reviews.content: So, I purchased my first pair of allbirds back in 2019 and was freaking pumped with them. Super comfortable and stylish. What's not to love, right? But I purchased another pair recently and have to say in all honesty that the fire has sadly fizzled out. Look, I know the pandemic changed everything. I'm sure between the choked global supply chains, universal economic uncertainty, and remote work perhaps consumers weren't buying as much apparel, thus leading to some ambivalent, but necessary changes. But they just don't feel the way they used to. They feel thinner, frail, stiff, and not nearly as supportive as the first pair I purchased. They're still stylish, though the white rubber sole seems chunkier than my previous pair which takes away from the streamlined, minimal aesthetic I loved the Skippers for. Overall, they're fine, though I really miss the good ol' days. But who doesn't? What a weird time to be alive.

highlights: water-repellent puddle guard® technology keeps feet dry

all-condition traction grips slippery surfaces

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Combining cozy ZQ Merino wool and a bio-based water repellent shield, our rain-ready sneaker keeps your feet predictably dry in unpredictable weather.

**Best For:** Walking, traction, water-repellent protection

**Super Soft Material:** Warm and cozy premium ZQ Merino wool provides next-level comfort

**Where It’s Made:** South Korea. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate)

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Wool Runner Mizzles have a carbon footprint of 10.95 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.

As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

  


**Sustainable Materials:**

* ZQ certified Merino wool upper that meets the highest standards of animal welfare, environmental care, and social sustainability
* Bio-based shield treated with fluorine-free water repellent coating
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new laces and insoles.

text.p: it’s soft and itch-free on the inside, water repellent and extra durable on the outside, and ethically sourced to zq merino’s high standards.
keep your feet dry with our breathable, bio-based shield and wool upper treated with an eco passport certified (by oeko-tex®) fluorine-free water repellent coating.

we layered castor bean oil, which emits less carbon than petroleum-based foam, and zq merino wool for a cushiony, moisture wicking, and odor reducing insole.
our laces are made from 100% post-consumer recycled polyester. one old plastic bottle becomes one pair of shoelaces.

text.h2: light on your feet. heavy on natural innovation.
text.p: how do you make superlight shoes? it starts at the midsole. to create our new superlight foam, we took sweetfoam’s sugarcane base and infused it with nitrogen (versus chemical foaming additives). the result? our lightest and lowest carbon midsole ever. it’s featherlight, high-performing, and even better for the planet thanks to approximately 70% bio-based content.

made with breezy fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber, the breathable, multi-panel upper hugs your foot and keeps the air flowing for all-day comfort.

highlights: rugged outsole grips hiking trails
tear-resistant ripstop mudguard protects feet from tough terrain
snug, sock-like collar blocks debris

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Tackle off-road terrain with our first-ever hiking & trail running shoe. Top-tested for durability, stability, and traction, it’s the sneaker, comfort, and sustainability you love with new ripstop fabric, grippy treads, and stabilizing support to take on any adventure.

**Best For:** Trail running, hiking, walking

**Natural Innovation:** Durable, water-resistant finish helps keep shoes from getting soggy

**All-Condition Traction:** Multi-directional 4mm lugs perform on any terrain

**Where It’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate).

dropdown.title: Testing & Specs
dropdown.content:
We rigorously road tested The Trail Runner SWT over 2,000 miles with 100 runners of all ages, abilities, and body types.

**Specs:**

Heel Drop7mm (Forefoot: 18.0 mm, Heel: 25.0 mm)Weight11.96ozOutsoleMultidirectional 4mm outsole lugs

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Trail Runner SWTs has a carbon footprint of 9.37 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.  
  
As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) and ZQ Merino Wool blend upper
* ZQ Merino wool and recycled polyester ripstop
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Bio-based TPU seam tape and heel counter
* Bio-based nylon eyelets
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. They’ll go back to their original shape in no time. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

name: Men's Tree Flyers
highlights: new bio-based swiftfoam™ midsole is light, bouncy, and ready for distance running
breathable upper helps keep the air flowing for extra comfortable miles
heel counter and flared, geometric midsole help keep your stride steady

dropdown.title: Details
dropdown.content:
Go faster and farther with the Tree Flyer. Lightweight, super springy, and wildly comfortable, this distance running shoe makes your extra efforts feel effortless. 

**SwiftFoam Saves The Day.** New high-performance midsole is big on cushion and energy return, making long runs easier on your body.

**Stability For Miles.** External heel counter and flared, geometric midsole help keep your stride steady. 

**Feel The Breeze.** Lightweight, breathable eucalyptus fiber upper provides next-level comfort. 

**Where It’s Made:** Vietnam. Learn more about [our operations](/pages/how-we-operate).

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Tree Flyer has a carbon footprint of 9.92 kg CO2e Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact. As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Low Energy, High Performance.** Innovative low-heat foaming process means our new SwiftFoam™ midsole production requires significantly less energy. 

**Bio-Based Bounce.** Thanks to the mighty castor bean, our SwiftFoam™ midsole is 48% bio-based. 

**Recycled Stability.** External heel counter made entirely of scraps from the SwiftFoam™ midsole production process.

**More Plants, Less Plastic.** Signature FSC-certified eucalyptus tree upper blend replaces the usual fully oil-based polyester or nylon upper without sacrificing any performance. Compared to traditional materials like nylon, our tree fiber cuts our carbon footprint in half.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) upper
* SwiftFoam™ midsole made with bio-based Pebax®
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* SweetFoam® insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining

dropdown.content:
The Tree Flyer went through an extensive testing and development process with over 100 runners logging thousands of miles across an array of conditions and climates.

Heel Drop8.5mm (Forefoot: 22.0mm, Heel: 30.5mm)Weight281.64g (9.93oz)

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

dropdown.content:
Free shipping on orders over $75, and our 30 days, no questions asked return policy. Lightly worn shoes get donated to Soles4Souls. Visit our [Returns Portal](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/returns-exchanges).

text.p: lightweight and super springy, our new swiftfoam™ midsole makes your extra efforts feel effortless. it provides serious cushion and comfort, so even the toughest runs are easier on your body. and the flared, geometric design helps add stability to each and every stride.

made with breezy fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber, the supportive upper hugs your foot and keeps the air flowing for extra comfortable miles. the recycled heel counter gives you a more balanced and stable ride, so you can find your pace and forget about the rest.

the tree flyer is a bonafide road runner. fsc-certified natural rubber tread with a zonal traction pattern gives you a strong foothold on pavement. the outsole was also engineered to flex, helping to smooth out heel-to-toe transitions and increase energy return.

we worked all the angles with our new swiftfoam™ midsole, literally cutting corners to help give you maximum cushioning with minimal weight. but we also went wide where needed. the flared heel design adds stability and helps keep your stride smooth and steady.

reviews.title: Poor Collar Design, Great Aesthetics
reviews.content: I loved the design of the shoe and the build quality. I was devastated when the heel collar didn't remotely keep my foot in the shoe at a gentle walk, much less a sprint. Even trying multiple sizes and cinching the shoe laces way too tight, my foot slipped right out. Several friends also bought them and they say the same thing. It's a good looking shoe, but I just use them for walking around and I make sure they are not too tight.

reviews.title: Gift from my son
reviews.content: These are very comfortable and fit perfect👍

reviews.title: Painful Experience
reviews.content:
I fell for the hype and bought those Allbird shoes my friend recommended. The website promised they'd be breathable and comfy from the get-go, people say no breaking in required. And sure enough, they looked great and felt okay when I first tried them on. So I brought them with me on my trip to Italy, thinking they'd be perfect for all the walking we'd be doing.

But let me tell you, wearing those shoes without socks was a colossal mistake. Within just two hours of walking around, the eye holes rubbed the tops of my feet raw and made them blister and bleed. I had to beg someone to let me borrow a pair of socks to alleviate the pain. They had low-cut socks that did not cover the backside of the top of the eyehole. They continued to rub and bleed. I now have a permanent scar on my foot from Allbirds. I wish this review would let me post a picture of the damage to my feet on here. Maybe on another review site. Moral of the story...Do not buy Allbirds...unless you want pain and scarring.
